name: Wakwak
description: The Wakwak is a large beast characterized by its agility and ferocity in combat, featuring sharp talons and a beak.
memorable: Noted for its ability to knock foes prone and gain temporary hit points, making it difficult to take down.
goals: To hunt in packs and dominate its enemies through swift attacks and tactical advantages.
relations: Commonly found with other beasts or creatures that support its pack tactics.
environment: Typically found in open areas where it can utilize its speed and flying ability.
strengths: Strong physical attributes and effective in coordinated pack tactics that enhance its combat effectiveness.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and moderate Wisdom limit its mental capabilities and perception.
attacks: Attacks with a beak and talons, dealing slashing and piercing damage, respectively, while able to execute a powerful wing slap.
most_powerful_ability: Bloodthirsty Pounce allows it to knock targets down and gain temporary hit points.
senses: Possesses keen smell, granting advantage on Perception checks related to smell.
skills: Has a passive perception of 12, indicating average awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Uses Pack Tactics for combat advantages.
Can fly, albeit at a limited speed.
Capable of disrupting enemy formations with Wing Slap.
Gains temporary hit points when attacking prone targets.
Effective melee combatant in pack scenarios.
test_queries: large ferocious beast with sharp talons
agile creature that hunts in packs
beast that can knock enemies prone
creature with keen smell and pounce ability
